trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There were no other sightings in Chandler on or around September 15th 2008
Summary: Saw a yellowish/white light going south to north
divs: sighting detailsi was out in my backyard and looked up at the stars. as i was admiring the sky, i noticed that one of the stars was moving very fast from the south to north over my head. it was yellowish\white with no other blinking lights. it was very high and looked exactly like the other stars in the sky. i don't know if the international space station went over head or another satellite, but i'm sure it wasn't a plane. once it went over my yard and headed towards the north it disappeared. i'm not sure what it was, i just wanted to know if anyone else saw anything last night as well.
